snippet: A committee in Saudi Arabia has recommended that “because of the scarcity of swordsmen and their unavailability in a number of regions” the princes who govern provinces should be free to use firing squads.
abstract: Saudi Arabia committee says due to scarcity of swordsmen available for beheadings, kingdom is considering firing squads as an alternative means of execution.
lead_paragraph: A committee in Saudi Arabia has recommended that “because of the scarcity of swordsmen and their unavailability in a number of regions” the princes who govern provinces should be free to use firing squads.

headline.main: Saudis Consider Firing Squads for Executions
headline.print_headline: Saudis Consider Firing Squads for Executions
